parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To carry, bear, bring; I conduct, lead; perhaps: I make publicly known. A primary verb.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A colt, young ass, foal. Apparently a primary word; a 'foal' or 'filly', i.e., a young ass.
To, towards, with. A strengthened form of pro; a preposition of direction; forward to, i.e. Toward.
Of Hebrew origin; Jesus, the name of our Lord and two other Israelites.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: From epi and ballo; to throw upon; specially to reflect; impersonally, to belong to.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Plural
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
A long flowing outer garment, tunic. Neuter of a presumed derivative of ennumi; a dress.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: Another form for kathezomai; to seat down, i.e. Set; intransitively, to sit; figuratively, to settle.
On, to, against, on the basis of, at.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
